S04n258:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhibhikṣusahasraiḥ |
S04n258:3: tadyathā āyuṣmatā cājñātakauṇḍinyena āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā āyuṣmatā ca revatena āyuṣmatā ca vakkulena āyuṣmatā ca śāripu[treṇā āyuṣmatā ca] pūrṇena maitrāyaṇī[putreṇa] ca śrāvakaniyutaiḥ |
S04n258:4: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthurdvātriṃśatā bodhisattvasahasraiḥ |
S04n258:5: tadyathā sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartanena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anikṣiptadhureṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avalokiteśvareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena |
S04n258:7: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthuḥ |
S04n258:8: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāṇhakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramā[traḥ] śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat |
S04n258:11: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ śrutamātreṇa pātraṃ cakrikaṃ śikyaṃ bhagavate upanāmayāmāsa |
S04n258:21: athāyuṣmānāndo bhagavata imā gāthā bhāṣitva tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:22: atha bhagavān śrāvasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:23: atha te sarve gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhakā [hiraṇya]mayāḥ sphaṭikamayā rūpyamayāḥ prādurbhūvan |
S04n258:24: tathā śrāvastyāṃ ma[hānagaryāṃ] mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃsthito'bhūvan |
S04n258:25: atha sa janakāyaḥ saṃśayajāto babhūva ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ nagarasya śubhanimittaṃ prādurabhūt |
S04n258:27: atha tatra janakāye anekavarṣaśata sahastrakoṭiko vṛddhamahallakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsthito'bhūt |
S04n258:29: mā bhaiṣurbhoḥ kulaputrāḥ asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraḥ |
S04n258:30: tatra śākyamunirnām tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n258:33: atha sa janakāyastaṃ jīrṇakaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtāñjalirevamāha |
S04n258:34: yattasya bhagavatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya gu[ṇavarṇasamudīraṇa]samaye idaṃ śubhanimittamabhūt |
S04n258:35: dṛṣṭamātrasya tasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kiddaśaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:36: atha sa jīrṇakapuruṣastaṃ janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇasamudīraṇatayā gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:37: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe
S04n258:41: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe
S04n258:47: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe
S04n258:52: yat kiṃci pūrvaṃ sada pāpu yat kṛtaṃ
S04n258:62: atha sa jīrṇakaḥ purūṣo janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:63: atha bhagavān pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviṣṭo'bhut |
S04n258:64: tatra ca nagaradvāre dvādaśakoṭyaḥ padmānāṃ prādurabhūvan |
S04n258:65: teṣu ca padmeṣu dvādaśakoṭyo bodhisattvānāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ prādurbhuvan prāñjalayaḥ |
S04n258:66: atha bhagavataḥ praviṣṭamātreṇa śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ navanavatikoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇi sattvānāṃ sukhāvatyām lokadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāni caturaśītisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇyābhiratyā lo[kadhāto]rakṣobhyatathāgatasya buddhakṣetre pratiṣṭhāpitāni |
S04n258:67: atha bhagavān ā[nandena saha nagara]valambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe samāgato'bhūta |
S04n258:68: atha bhagavān nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe cakrikaṃ kaṭakaṭāpayāmāsa |
S04n258:69: atha sā dārikā taṃ cakrīśabdaṃ śrutva saṃśayajātābhūt |
S04n258:71: mama gṛhe na kadācit piṇḍapātika āgato'bhūt |
S04n258:72: atha sa nagaravalambikā dāikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī paridevantī sthitābhūt tīkṣṇadhāramasīṃ gaveṣantī paridevantī rudantī sthitābhūt |
S04n258:73: atha [sā] dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā paridevantī aśru[kaṇṭhī] rudantī gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:75: varaṃ mama maraṇu na cāpi jīvitam |
S04n258:79: anāthabhūtā ahamadyameva yadyaivāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe ||
S04n258:80: atha sa nagaravalaṃbikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe [niṣaṇṇā] imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitābhūt |
S04n258:83: anekaduṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahastracīrṇacaritaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato nagaravalaṃbikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:84: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputraḥ śatasahastramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kāśikāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā yena nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrānto'bhūt |
S04n258:86: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imānyanekaśatasahastrmūlyānyābharaṇāni |
S04n258:87: prāvṛtya cedaṃ śatasahastramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā imaṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantamupanāmaya |
S04n258:88: atha sā dārīkā tāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi pravṛtya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāram gṛhītva taṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā |
S04n258:91: pariṇāmaya tvaṃ dārike yathā pariṇāmitaṃ vipaśyiśikhiviśvabhūkkakutasundakanakamunikāśyapaprabhṛtibhiḥ sadbhistathāgatairarhabhdiḥ samyaksambuddhaiḥ |
S04n258:93: atha sā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā bhagavantamupanāmayāmāsa |
S04n258:94: anena piṇḍapātakuśalamūlena mā kaśmiṃścida daridragṛhe upapadyeya |
S04n258:95: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā bhagavate dattvā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā |
S04n258:100: atha sā dārikā pratinivṛtya sarvāṅgapraṇi[pātena] bhagavantaṃ prapatitā |
S04n258:101: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagava[ntaṃ gā]thābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:112: kṛtaṃ hi nātha praṇidhiṃ tvayā hi
S04n258:118: tvayaṃ hi nātha mayi mocayī jagat
S04n258:129: nāmaṃ ca vai dhāraya paśca kāle ||
S04n258:134: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā pu[narapi] gṛhagamanamārabdhā |
S04n258:135: atha bhagavān tāṃ nagaravalambikāṃ [dārikāṃ kala] viṅkarutasvaranirghoṣeṇaivamāha |
S04n258:153: bhūtapūrvo dārike atīte'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpai ratnaśikhī nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n258:154: tena khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatī nāma rājadhānyabhūt |
S04n258:155: tena khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ padmaprabho nāma gṛhapatirabhūt |
S04n258:157: tena khalu punaḥ samayena grāmanagaranigamajanapadeṣu piṇḍapātiko bhikṣūḥ piṇḍapātāyāvatarati |
S04n258:158: yadā tvadgṛhamāgato'bhūta tadā tvaṃ dārike piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gṛhānniṣkrāntā punareva praviṣṭā'bhūḥ |
S04n258:160: tena karmopacayena tvayā dārike dvādaśakalpasahasrāṇi punaḥ punardaridragṛhe duḥkhānyanubhūtāni |
S04n258:161: ekena tvayā dārike kuśalamūlena bodhivyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyase |
S04n258:162: yattvayā tasya bhikṣo rūpaliṅgasaṃsthā na dṝṣṭā bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ dārike anāgate'dhvani acintyairaparimāṇaiḥ kalpairnagaradhvajo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān loke |
S04n258:163: atha sā dārikā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣīṇaṃ kṛtvaivamāha |
S04n258:164: kidṛśaṃ bhagavan mama buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatraivāhaṃ buddho bhaviṣyāmi |
S04n258:167: yādṛśī ca sā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ tādṛśaṃ tadabuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:170: atha ca sā dārikā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā |
S04n258:172: tvaṃ dārike saptame divase kālaṃ kariṣyasi |
S04n258:176: tasya khalu puna rājñao'jitasenasya putro janiṣyase |
S04n258:177: eṣa eva tava paścimo garbhavāso bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:178: atha bhagavān paścimakena nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastyā mahānagaryā niṣkrānto yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:179: athāyuṣmānāndo bhagavantaṃ dūrat evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā pādau śirasābhivandya triḥpradakṣīṇīkṛtya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:195: athāyuṣmānānanda imā gāthā bhāṣitva bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣīṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratastasthau |
S04n258:203: ye kecidānanda gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ pacānantaryāṇi kṛtyāni parikṣayaṃ yāsyanti |
S04n258:208: śruṇu ānanda ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmavipralope vartamāne saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrārājadhānīṣu ye sattvā [vā] araṇyāyatane gaṇḍayākoṭanaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti namo buddhāyeti kariṣyanti teṣāṃ pacānantaryāṇi karmāṇi parikṣayaṃ yāsyanti |
S04n258:211: atha tena gaṇḍīśabdena sarve te mahāśrāvakāḥ sannipatitā abhūvan |
S04n258:212: yathā yathā āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhūñjante sma |
S04n258:213: atha tatraiva śrāvakamadhye nandimitro nāma mahāśrāvakaḥ sannipatito'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ |
S04n258:215: gaccha tvaṃ nandimitra mahāśrāvaka pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño'jitasenasya kalyāṇamitraparicaryā kuru |
S04n258:221: na te sattvāste śakṣyante bālāgramapi kampayituṃ prāgeva jīvitādvyavaropayitum |
S04n258:222: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvakaḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye suvarṇavarṇaṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya yena pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño'jitasenasya rājadhāṇi tenānukrānto'bhūt |
S04n258:223: atha rājā ajitasenastaṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto'bhūt |
S04n258:228: āgaccha mahāśrāvaka bhikṣo rājā te ājñāpayati |
S04n258:230: mama rājña kiṃ kārya mama rājā kiṃ kariṣyati |
S04n258:233: na ca sa bhikṣustava pārśve āgacchati |
S04n258:236: atha sa rājā svakenaivātmabhāvena yena sa nandimitramahāśrāvakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:238: āgaccha bho bhikṣo mama rājadhānīṃ praviśa |
S04n258:239: atha rājā ajitaseno dakṣiṇahaste taṃ bhikṣūṃ gṛhītvā svakāṃ rājadhānīṃ praviṣṭo'bhūt |
S04n258:240: atha rājñājitasenena nandimitrasya bhikṣoḥ siṃhāsanaṃ dattamabhūt |
S04n258:241: atha rājājitaseno bhadrapīṭhake niṣadya taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakamevamāha |
S04n258:245: ye kecid bhikṣupravrajitāste sarve bhikṣāhārāḥ piṇḍapātamavacarantaḥ paribhuñjanti |
S04n258:249: yadi te bhikṣo mama svamāṃsena kāryaṃ svamāṃsaṃ dāsyāmi |
S04n258:267: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:268: atha rājānamajitasenaṃ taṃ nandimitro mahāśrāvako gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:272: na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāśca ||
S04n258:291: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:293: evamastu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapāta tava gṛhe |
S04n258:294: atha rājā ajitasenaṃ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma |
S04n258:296: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmirasti |
S04n258:306: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇāste sarve santītī |
S04n258:307: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyastāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyastā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ |
S04n258:311: ye tiryagyonigatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśārikācakravākamayūrakokilā dayaste nānārutāni kurvanti sma |
S04n258:312: atha tatraiva udyānabhūmau suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣīṇaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ |
S04n258:314: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño'jitasenasya rājadhāṇī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:320: atha nandimitram mahāśrāvakaṃ rāja ajitaseno gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:330: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇī sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:331: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma |
S04n258:335: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt |
S04n258:337: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutva śīghrameva tada hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ |
S04n258:338: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtamātreṇa rājājitaseno yena sodyānabhūmistenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:340: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyam yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇastava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi |
S04n258:345: atha rāhā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhāmātyamevamāha'sminneva pṛthavīpradeśe kuṭikaṃ kāraya |
S04n258:349: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanānyūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisamcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya |
S04n258:351: saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisaṃcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṃkrānto rājānamajitasenamevamāha |
S04n258:354: tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe caṃkramaḥ kārayitavyaścaturyojanāni dīrgheṇa dve yojane vistāreṇa |
S04n258:355: atha so'mātyastaṃ caṃkramaṃ kāayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṃkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:365: ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā |
S04n258:368: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhāgī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:369: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ pratinivṛtya tatraiva kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpanno'bhūt |
S04n258:370: anyena keśānanyena nayanānyanyena dantānanyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayamanyenodaramanyenorū anyena jaṅgaghe anyena pādau samāpanno'bhūt |
S04n258:371: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣūṃ na paśyati ||
S04n258:375: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṃkrānto'bhūt |
S04n258:376: atha sa rājā ajitasenastaṃ bhikṣumātmabhāvam khaṇḍaṃ khāṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛstvā saṃśayajāto'bhūt |
S04n258:377: saṃtrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭayan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putramevamāha |
S04n258:380: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata |
S04n258:383: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi |
S04n258:386: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣairna bhūtairna ca rākṣasaiḥ |
S04n258:394: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim |
S04n258:396: atha sa rājakumārastaṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāsitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:398: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yadayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno'bhūt |
S04n258:400: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣurbodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṃgataḥ sarvasattvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham |
S04n258:403: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhirdārakaśataiḥ sārdha yena sa caṃkramastenopasaṃkrāntau |
S04n258:406: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣū dṛṣṭvā maulipattaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti |
S04n258:413: na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam |
S04n258:416: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ prāñjalirevamāha |
S04n258:432: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:443: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitva tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:444: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma |
S04n258:445: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvāstā amātyakoṭyo rājānamevamāhuḥ |
S04n258:448: saptame divase hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ rayāt |
S04n258:449: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya |
S04n258:452: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:453: atha bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭrā tāna sarvaśrāvakānāmantrayat |
S04n258:455: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan |
S04n258:456: atha rājā dūratastaṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakamevamāha |
S04n258:459: atra śākyamunistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati |
S04n258:460: te ca bodhisattvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ |
S04n258:461: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathādavatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n258:462: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṃkramate sma |
S04n258:463: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṃgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ |
S04n258:464: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānamutthāpayati sma |
S04n258:465: uttiṣṭha mahārāja kasyārthe prapatitaḥ | rājā āha |
S04n258:478: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ |
S04n258:479: alabdhālābhā ye [tatra] mama śāsanaṃ vaistārikaṃ bhavati |
S04n258:481: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi |
S04n258:482: atha rājā ajitasenastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītīsaumanasyajātastaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣu purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvānamātyānāmantrayate sma |
S04n258:483: sarvairgrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajānyucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūrayitavyāni |
S04n258:485: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajānyucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni |
S04n258:486: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānāmucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ |
S04n258:487: yāvat saptame divase tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanāndapūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputrapramukhairmahāśrāvakasaṃghaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ ajitasenasya rājño rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ |
S04n258:488: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakiran bhagavantamevamāha |
S04n258:492: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavāg |
S04n258:493: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ |
S04n258:494: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti |
S04n258:514: śīghraṃ ca pravrajya mayā hi labdhaṃ
S04n258:518: atha rājakumāro'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:519: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra ātta[ma]nāḥ pramuditaḥ [prīti]saumanasyajāto bhagavantamuddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma |
S04n258:522: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito'bhūt |
S04n258:525: bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ pravrājya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastena gamanamārabdhavān |
S04n258:527: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno rājyaṃ parityajya vihāraṃ kārayitvā bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito'bhūt |
S04n258:531: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:532: anāgate'dhvanyaparimitaiḥ kalpairacintyairaparimāṇairajitaprabho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyak saṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n258:537: ayamānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakastatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:539: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ tathāġatānāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:541: aparimitaguṇasaṃcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatreme tathāġatā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n258:543: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayiṣyati tasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:545: yadā mayānanda duṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi caritvā bodhirabhisaṃbuddhā tadā te sattvā bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante |
S04n258:546: ya etaddharmaparyāyāt catuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti avaivartikāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n258:548: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dharmabhāṇakāḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti teṣāṃ kidṛśaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:550: śṛṇu ānanda rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturdvīpeśvara |
S04n258:551: ya imaṃ dhamaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti muktāśca bhaviṣyanti jātijarāvyādhiparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n258:553: ye paścime kāle paścime samaye sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti teṣāṃ kā gatirbhaviṣyati kaḥ parāyaṇam |
S04n258:563: raurave mahānarake hāhahe mahānarake avīcau mahānarake tiryagyonau yamaloke ca pretaviṣaye bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhavitavyam |
S04n258:567: mā bhoḥ kulaputrā bhoḥ kvacit saddharmaṃ pratikṣepṣyatha |
S04n258:570: kena hetunā bhagavan saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhavati |
S04n258:572: ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye eteṣāṃ sūtrānudhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇākānāmakrośiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante kutsayiṣyanti paṃsayiṣyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya duṣṭacittamutpādyiṣyanti tebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhaviṣyati |
S04n258:573: yaḥ sattvaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāmakṣīṇyutpāṭayet ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandho bhavet |
S04n258:574: evameva ya eteṣāṃ sūtra dhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇākāṇāṃ duṣṭacittaprekṣitā ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyate |
S04n258:579: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśiṣye dhārayiṣye imaṃ nayam ||
S04n258:583: athāyuṣmānando bhagavato gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito'bhūt |
S04n258:602: ahaṃ hi paścime kāle nirvṛte tvayi nāyake |
S04n258:621: deyadharmoyaṃ bālosiṃhena sārdha bhāryājājatitrana sārdhaṃ mātāpitroḥ paramaduṣkartroḥ sādha kṣīṇī ena akhiloṭi ena diśoṭajāja maṃgali.......utrayannagarvidoṭiena vaṭrari–khuśoṭi–khūśogoṭi ena sārdha sarvasattvaiḥ sarva......bhiryatra puṇya tadbha......sarvasattvānāmanuttaraḥ......sārdha paramakalyāṇamitrasthirabandhu ena |
